item.title: Comparing NFL Football Python Packages
item.description:
In the spirit of the NFL regular season concluding and playoffs beginning soon, I wondered what packages Python had in the NFL stats space. Below, I have compiled my notes below on each of the libraries I found for the NFL in Python.
